email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your recent inquiry for a crude oil shipment. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Oceanic Star, available for a 100,000 MT cargo. The vessel has a DWT of 120,000 and an LOA of 250 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per MT. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were hoping for. Could you consider lowering it to the low 50s, say $50.75 per MT? Also, can you confirm the load port is Houston and the discharge port is Rotterdam? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can adjust the freight rate to $51.00 per MT, which I believe is competitive given the current market. Yes, the load port is Houston, and the discharge port is Rotterdam. The laycan remains 15-20 October. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 per MT sounds reasonable. Can we also agree on a demurrage rate of $15,000 per day, pro rata, in case of delays? Also, please confirm the laytime is 72 hours total. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, we can agree to the demurrage rate of $15,000 per day, pro rata. The laytime is confirmed as 72 hours total. I’ll prepare the charter party agreement with these terms. Let me know if there’s anything else you’d like to discuss before we proceed. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good to me. Please go ahead and prepare the charter party agreement. Let’s aim to finalize by end of day. Thanks for your help on this. Cheers, John
